title: Renewable energy in Australia
creator_credit: Film Australia, Michael Rubetzki and Philip Robertson
brief_description: The film presents a range of alternatives to conventional energy sources for small-scale power requirements. Surveys the systems and technology currently available in Australia including wind, mini-hydro, biomass and photovoltaic systems.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Michael Rubetzki and Philip Robertson
